abstract_ssm: This collection contains materials relating to the architectural firm of Martyn and Don Weston from 1936 to 1968. Items include certificates and a plaque awarded to Martyn Weston throughout his career as an architect, such as a citation of recognition from the City of New York. These materials provide a snapshot of Weston's projects and his work with local and state architectural associations.
corpname_ssm: New York State Association of Architects
